code: export var validateQuestion=function validateQuestion(question){var errors=[];if(!question.title){errors.push({field:"title",type:"required",message:"Title is required"});}question.choices.forEach(function(choice,index){if(!choice.value){errors.push({field:"choices[".concat(index,"].value"),type:"required",message:"Choice value is required"});}});if(!question.answer){errors.push({field:"answer",type:"required",message:"Answer is required"});}if(!question.explanation){errors.push({field:"explanation",type:"required",message:"explanation is required"});}return errors.length?errors:null;};
